*This text will be italic*
_This will also be italic_

**This text will be bold**
__This will also be bold__

_You **can** combine them_


```python
import pandas as pd

s1 = "Hello World"
pd.read_table('table.txt', sep='\t', header=None, dtype=str)
print(s1)

```

Case of R

```r
for(i in 1:10){
    print(i)
}
```
